channel.title: field work on SXY
channel.description: Recent content in field work on SXY

item.title: UNSTABLE NARRATIVES，ACT1
item.description: I’m really sorry that you need to move here:, I can’t upload any image in our unstable narratives blog site :( In this week’s exploration, I mainly observed plants. I’m very interested in their “life”, daily life and life journey. I first continued to observe a plant I saw when I was passing by. It seemed very common, but I never noticed its change from day to night.

item.title: UNSTABLE NARRATIVES，ABOUT ME
item.description: Hi, I’m Xiaoya Sun from China, Beijing, and I’m currently on the Experimental Communication pathway. I think I am a real indoorsy girl. There are very few outdoor activities in my life. I browsed my photo album and found that the only thing related to the outdoors is the sky and clouds, and then I was thinking, how boring life I am living? Maybe because I always feel tired when I went out.
